name: Ice slide frozenride
description:
❄ Summary ❄

Play as Cooler, a superhero capable of mastering the ice and try to go as far as possible while collecting sapphires and avoiding flame laser, penguin missiles and obstacles.

❆ Gameplay ❆

The game is played like a jetpack joyride, you press the up arrow key to gain altitude, and release the key to go back down. You can pickup the bonus that grants one more life, meaning that when you get hit you lose your bonus. The characters gains velocity so that it feels natural playing the game.

❅ Credits ❅

Sprites where picked from opengameart.org, the sound effects from freesound.org.

David Tchillian composed the music for us.

In memory of Issam Mrini
